parse.title: Legendary Decks II
parse.wikitext:
{{Infobox set | image = LDK2-DeckEN.png | en_name = Legendary Decks II | fr_name = Decks Legendaires II | de_name = Legendary Decks II | it_name = I Deck Leggendari II | pt_name = Decks Lendários II | es_name = Barajas Legendarias II | type = Collector's Set | prefix = LDK2 | size = 135 | en_database_id = 18810002 | de_database_id = 28809003 | fr_database_id = 38809003 | it_database_id = 48809003 | pt_database_id = 18810002 | es_database_id = 58809003 | na_release_date = October 7, 2016 | eu_release_date = October 6, 2016 | oc_release_date = October 6, 2016 | fr/de/it/sp_release_date = October 6, 2016 | pt_release_date = October 7, 2016 | sp-lat_release_date = October 7, 2016 | prev = Yugi's Legendary Decks | next = Legendary Dragon Decks }} '''''Legendary Decks II''''' is a ''[[TCG]]''-exclusive set that contains 3 pre-constructed Decks, and is the second set in the ''[[Legendary Decks]]'' series. ==Breakdown== Each set contains: * A 40-card Deck based on [[Yugi Muto|Yugi]]'s "[[Exodia the Forbidden One]]" and "[[Dark Magician]]", plus 3 [[Ultra Rare]] promotional cards (the tournament-legal versions of the [[Egyptian God]] cards) and an Ultra Rare Yugi Token card * A 43-card Deck based on [[Seto Kaiba|Kaiba]]'s "[[Blue-Eyes White Dragon]]", plus an Ultra Rare Kaiba Token card * A 43-card Deck based on [[Joey Wheeler|Joey]]'s "[[Red-Eyes Black Dragon]]" and [[Gemini monster]]s, plus an Ultra Rare Joey Token card * 3 [[Secret Rare]] promotional cards: "[[Eternal Soul]]", "[[Dark Burning Attack]]", and "[[Dark Burning Magic]]". The Kaiba and Joey Decks each include the following: *3 [[Ultra Rare]] cards *40 [[Common]] cards *1 Token The Yugi Deck includes the following: *6 [[Ultra Rare]] cards *37 [[Common]] cards *1 Token ==Galleries== LDK2-DeckEN.png | English

[[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-DE-1E)|1st Edition]] / [[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-DE-LE)|Limited Edition]] LDK2-DeckIT.png | Italian
[[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-IT-1E)|1st Edition]] / [[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-IT-LE)|Limited Edition]] LDK2-DeckPT.png | Portuguese
[[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-PT-1E)|1st Edition]] / [[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-PT-LE)|Limited Edition]] LDK2-DeckSP.png | Spanish
[[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-SP-1E)|1st Edition]] / [[Set Card Galleries:Legendary Decks II (TCG-SP-LE)|Limited Edition]] ==List== {{Set navigation | lists = EN,FR,DE,IT,PT,SP | 1e_galleries = EN,FR,DE,IT,PT,SP | ue_galleries = EN | le_galleries = EN,FR,DE,IT,PT,SP }} {{Set list tabs|EN,FR,DE,IT,PT,SP}} ==Trivia== * During the determining of the set contents for the ''[[2016 Mega-Tin Mega Pack]]''s, the "[[Red-Eyes]]"-related cards from ''[[Clash of Rebellions]]'' were ommitted in favor of being included in this product, according to [https://yugiohblog.konami.com/articles/?p=7906 an article] published by [[Jerome McHale]]. ==References== * [http://www.ideal808.com/catalog/ygo/legendaryDeckII/550423 ideal808.com] ''Legendary Decks II'' * [https://ygorganization.com/tcg-yu-gi-oh-legendary-decks-ii/ YGOOrganization] ==External links== * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/en/products/legendary_decks_2.html yugioh-card.com/en] ''Legendary Decks II'' * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/uk/products/ldk2.html yugioh-card.com/uk] ''Legendary Decks II'' * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/oc/products/ldk2.html yugioh-card.com/oc] ''Legendary Decks II'' * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/fr/products/ldk2.html yugioh-card.com/fr] ''Decks Legendaires II'' {{icon|fr}} * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/de/products/ldk2.html yugioh-card.com/de] ''Legendary Decks II'' {{icon|de}} * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/it/products/ldk2.html yugioh-card.com/it] ''I Deck Leggendari II'' {{icon|it}} * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/lat-am/pt/products/legendary_decks_2.html yugioh-card.com/lat-am/pt] ''Decks Lendários II'' {{icon|pt}} * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/es/products/idk2.html yugioh-card.com/es] ''Barajas Legendarias II'' {{icon|es}} * [http://www.yugioh-card.com/lat-am/products/legendary_decks_2.html yugioh-card.com/lat-am] ''Barajas Legendarias II'' {{icon|es}} {{Starter and Structure Decks}} [[Category:Preconstructed Decks]]
